|c|☆XpokVEVO|What do I do then
|c|☆Leo Justice|I noticed it and I allowed myself the opportunity to set up on you
|c|☆Leo Justice|It's just a flaw of HO tbh
|c|☆Leo Justice|You'd need like
|c|☆Leo Justice|A steel type
|c|☆XpokVEVO|I used to have magearna
|c|☆Leo Justice|But none except mag fit
|c|☆XpokVEVO|What should i swap out for magearna
|c|☆Leo Justice|But mag is kinda eh on HO
|c|☆XpokVEVO|Shisui?
|c|☆Leo Justice|Plus if i was just Arceus dark from the startv
|c|☆Leo Justice|It wouldn't matter
|c|☆XpokVEVO|How?
|c|☆Leo Justice|Because i outdamage ur mag
|c|☆Leo Justice|U can't use calm mind
|c|☆Leo Justice|And I can
|c|☆XpokVEVO|Dont need to oneshot arc
|c|☆Leo Justice|So eventually I'll do enough with not very effective judgements
|c|☆XpokVEVO|Rematch
